channel.title: Posts on Gert Van Gool
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gert Van Gool

item.title: Continuous deployment with Hugo
item.description: For better automation (and easier updating), I've added CircleCI for automated building and testing of the website. It will automatically deploy any pushes to the master into a separate git repository (to take advantage of Github Pages).

item.title: First Post
item.description: Why start blogging now? Actually, it’s basically an excuse for a new website. For a new photography website. In the meanwhile, I can dump some documents littered across my computers with tiny bits of information.
